text: Edward S. Feldman (September 5, 1929 – October 2, 2020) was an American movie and television producer. He was born in New York City. Feldman was known for his works Witness, The Truman Show and The Golden Child. Feldman died on October 2, 2020 in Los Angeles, aged 91.Edward S. Feldman Dies: Oscar- Nominated ‘Witness’ Producer Was 91 ==References== ==Other websites== * * FilmReference.com Category:1929 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Movie directors from New York City Category:Movie producers from New York City
title: Edward S. Feldman
